bitebit.description: Bitebit is a jack of all trades, relying on swift melee strikes to generate hype. Its diverse arsenal of abilities is sure to be useful in any situation!

skills.name: ENERGETIC JAB I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: FULGUROUS STEPS I
skills.description: 100% chance of dodging one attack this turn action.

skills.name: PUTRID VINE I
skills.description: Inflict Poison to the opponent for 2 turns. At the end of each turn, Poison deals damage equal to 10% of max HP.

skills.name: THUNDER PUNCH II
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 60 Power.

skills.name: STORMBREAKER'S ZEAL III
skills.description: Your Attack is raised by 3 stages for 3 turns. Then, perform a Ranged attack of 75 Power.

dipking.description: Dipking features high-cost abilities, but don't worry; if you can hold out long enough using evasive actions, it can unleash explosive damage!

skills.name: ENERGETIC JAB I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: MISTY STEPS II
skills.description: 100% chance of dodging one attack this turn action. If triggered, your Attack is raised by 1 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: CLEANSING WAVE I
skills.description: Cleanse status effects on the opponent.

skills.name: DELUGE II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 110 Power.

skills.name: RIPTIDE III
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 75 Power. If your current HP is lower than the opponent, deal double damage.

dinobit.description: Dinobit has the highest HP among the Nefties, and you can use this to your advantage since you deal more damage when its health surpasses that of its opponent!

skills.name: ENERGETIC JAB I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: MUDHAMMER II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 40 Power using your Defense intead of Attack.

skills.name: ROCK WALL II
skills.description: Raise a Shield equal to 20% of your max HP for 2 turns.

skills.name: STAMPEDE III
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 110 Power. If your opponent's Defense is currently raised, drop the opponent's Defense by 2 stages for 3 turns.

skills.name: VITALITY STRIKE I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 45 Power. If your current HP is higher than the opponent, perform an additional Melee attack.

number-9.description: Number 9 is known for its variety of abilities to generate hype and enhance its attacks. Watch your back before its curse takes effect!

skills.name: FRAGILITY FLUX I
skills.description: Your Defense is dropped by 1 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: CATCH UP PUNCH I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power. If your current Hype is lower than the opponent, earn 3 Hype.

skills.name: EXPLOSIVE COUNTER I
skills.description: Dodge once and perform a Counter Attack of 40 Power if you are targeted by an attack this turn action.

skills.name: SCORCHING BITE II
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 85 Power.

skills.name: DETONATE III
skills.description: Inflict Curse to the opponent. After a countdown of 2 turns, Curse deals 30% of the opponent's max HP. Reapplying Curse increases initial Curse damage by 50%. This effect can stack and does not reset Curse duration.

axobubble.description: Axobubble sacrifices his defense to build up hype but reflects a portion of the damage dealt to his opponent. When the right moment arrives, he floods the arena to win!

skills.name: RECKLESS SHRIEK II
skills.description: Drop your Defense by 1 stage for 2 turns. Raise your Attack by 1 stage until the end of this turn.

skills.name: BUBBLECHAIN II
skills.description: Reflect back to the opponent 65% of the damage dealt this turn action. You take the remaining damage.

skills.name: CLEANSING TIDE I
skills.description: Cleanse status effects on you and the opponent.

skills.name: CRASHING WAVE II
skills.description: Perform a high priority Ranged attack of 70 Power. This attack goes before Reflects, Counters and Dodges and almost always goes first.

skills.name: VOLT SURGE III
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 115 Power.

unika.description: Unika prioritizes defense, and when enhanced, it transforms into a formidable damage dealer. Get ready for a tight battle!

skills.name: ENERGETIC JAB I
skills.description: Your Defense is dropped by 1 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: THICK COAT I
skills.description: Raise your Defense by 2 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: CLEANSING TIDE I
skills.description: Cleanse status effects on you and the opponent.

skills.name: KNOCKDOWN I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 60 Power using your Defense instead of Attack.

skills.name: BOULDER BASH II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 50 Power. If your Defense is higher than the opponent, perform an additional Ranged attack.

zzoo.description: Zzoo employs a defensive strategy to defeat opponents by deflecting attacks, countering with precision, and using the full force of the wind at the right moment to secure victory!

skills.name: WINGBLADE II
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: TALON GUARD I
skills.description: Deflect 80% of the damage dealt by one attack this turn action, regardless of the attack's priority. If triggered, earn back 2 Hype.

skills.name: SAND ECHOES II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 45 Power using your Speed instead of Attack.

skills.name: MIRROR COAT II
skills.description: Reflect back to the opponent 85% of the damage dealt by Melee attacks this turn action. You take the remaining damage. If triggered, Cleanse status effects on the opponent.

skills.name: STORMWEAVER'S CRY III
skills.description: Perform a low priority Ranged attack of 170 Power. This attack almost always goes last.

block-choy.description: Block Choy is well-equipped to outlast opponents through life-stealing and the use of poison, inflicting damage over time and ultimately winning a fight!

skills.name: FLOWING STRIKE I
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: SAPLING SMACK II
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 35 Power.

skills.name: SPICE LAYER II
skills.description: Raise a Shield equal to 15% of your max HP. If your current HP is lower than the opponent, upgrade your Shield equal to 30% of your max HP.

skills.name: VAMPIRIC ROOT I
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 75 Power. Lifesteal 40% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: STRANGLING ROOTS II
skills.description: Inflict Poison to the opponent for 5 turns. At the end of each turn, Poison deals damage equal to 10% of the opponent's max HP.

shiba-ignite.description: Shiba Ignite boasts substantial HP that can be used for life-tapping, boosting its hype. This empowers it to deal double damage when its health falls below the opponent's!

skills.name: LIFE TAP RITUAL I
skills.description: Self attack of 10 Power.

skills.name: AURANY'S RAGE II
skills.description: If you are hit this turn action, raise your Attack by 2 stages for 2 turns. If your HP is lower than your opponent, raise your Attack by an aditional stage and your Defense by 2 stages for 2 turns.

skills.name: EXPLOSIVE COUNTER I
skills.description: Dodge once and perform a Counter Attack of 40 Power if you are targeted by an attack this turn action.

skills.name: FIERY RAMPAGE II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 70 Power. If your current HP is lower than the opponent, deal double damage.

skills.name: EARTHQUAKE I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 100 Power.

raccoin.description: Raccoin, with its sly nature and laid-back demeanor, is famed for its agility and love for shady, tranquil resting spots.

skills.name: VIGOR HEIST I
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power. If your current Speed is lower than the opponent, raise your Speed by 1 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: SHARE THE WEALTH I
skills.description: Perform a Melee Attack of 60 Power. Raise your opponent's Speed by 1 for 2 turns.

skills.name: SLACK OFF II
skills.description: Heal yourself of 15% of your max HP. Drop your Defense by 1 stage until the end of the turn.

skills.name: LUCKY REFLEXES II
skills.description: Dodge and then perform a Counter Attack of 40 Power if you are hit by a Melee attack this turn action. If triggered, drop the opponent's Defense by 2 for 2 turns.

skills.name: FIRED UP III
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 70 Power. If your Speed is higher than the opponent, perform an additional Melee attack of 35 Power using your Speed instead of Attack.

shibark.description: Shibark wanders through expansive lands, sniffing out treasures and proudly claiming its territory with mighty howls.

skills.name: FRENZIED HOWL I
skills.description: Your Attack is raised by 1 for 1 turn. The opponent's Attack is raised by 1 for 1 turn.

skills.name: ENDURE II
skills.description: Deflect 45% of the damage taken by one attack this turn action. If triggered, earn 2 Hype.

skills.name: FLAME SPARK I
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 35 Power. Your Attack is raised by 1 stage for 2 turns.

skills.name: ROCKY PURSUIT II
skills.description: Perform a high priority Melee attack of 50 Power. This attack goes before reactive abilities and almost always goes first.

skills.name: GRIM FANG III
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 110 Power. If it hits, inflict Curse on the opponent. At the end of the turn, Curse deals 10% of the opponent's max HP. Reapplying Curse increases initial Curse damage by 50%. This effect can stack and does not reset Curse duration.

unikirin.description: Each step Unikirin takes resonates with the crackle of electric energy, a testament to its wild and untamed spirit.

skills.name: RECHARGE I
skills.description: Drop your Speed by 1 stage for 2 turns. Raise your Defense by 1 stage until the end of this turn.

skills.name: FULGUROUS STEPS I
skills.description: 100% chance of dodging one attack this turn action.

skills.name: FLAMETHROWER I
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 80 power.

skills.name: THUNDER STRIKE II

skills.name: ELECTRICAL OVERLOAD II
skills.description: If your Speed is currently dropped, perform a Ranged attack of 150 Power. Then, Cleanse yourself.

chocomint.description: Chocomint ranks among the swiftest Nefties, so make the most of its speed to evade and counter with precision. Harness the might of the sun to defeat your opponent!

skills.name: BARBED LEAF II
skills.description: Perform a high priority Ranged attack of 25 Power. If the attack is weak, inflict Poison on the opponent for 1 turn. At the end of each turn, Poison deals damage equal to 10% of the opponent's max HP. This attack almost always goes first.

skills.name: FROSTED BOLT II
skills.description: Perform a Ranged attack of 55 Power using your Speed instead of Attack.

skills.name: FULGUROUS STEPS I
skills.description: 100% chance of dodging one attack this turn action.

skills.name: ETHER WHIRLWIND I

skills.name: SUN BLAST III

cybertooth.description: Cybertooth uses its thick hide to fortify its defenses, skillfully weakening foes with its abilities to gain an advantage and deal significant damage.

skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power.

skills.name: AQUA BOLT I

skills.name: BALANCE SHIFT II

wassie.description: Wassie is a nimble Neftie known for harnessing its abilities to enhance its speed and inflict substantial damage.

skills.name: ENFEEBLING FLUX I

skills.name: FLASH VOLT III

dracurve.description: Dracurve dictates the course of battle with shifts in stats and status effects. Exercise caution, for a few strategic choices can swiftly pave the way to devastation.

skills.name: DRACONIC ROAR II
skills.description: Your Attack is raised and your Defense is dropped by 1 for 1 turn. Then, perform a Melee attack of 15 Power.

skills.name: AERIAL SLASH II

bloomtail.description: Bloomtail is a spirited Neftie fueled by the flower adorning its back. It is said that the flower occasionally affects its movements, adding an intriguing twist to its nature!

skills.name: ADRENALINE KICK II
skills.description: Perform a Melee attack of 20 Power. If if hits, earn 3 Hype.

skills.name: VAMPIRIC BLOOM III

ghouliath.description: Ghouliaths were mighty dragons once, but they now linger as ghosts until their unresolved matters are dealt with...

skills.name: AERIAL SLASH II

chocorex.description: Praised for its loyalty, Chocorex stands as a favored companion and trusted mount within Tokane. However, due to its limited intelligence, it requires skilled riders.

keybab.description: When activating its self-defense mechanism, Keybab changes color to boiling red, and its spicy vapor makes anyone who inhales it shed tears.

beeblock.description: Beeblock, known for its calm nature, is tamed for its production of a deliciously sweet jelly named Nury. But when threatened, it delivers powerful stings, warding off any attacker.

skills.name: POLLENIZE I
skills.description: Heal yourself for 7% of your max HP.

skills.name: BUZZING DANCE II

skills.name: THORNY RIPOSTE II
skills.description: Dodge once and then perform a Counter Attack of 45 Power using your Speed instead of Attack if you are hit this turn action.

skills.name: SYLPHOR'S PURGE III
skills.description: Cleanse yourself. Then, perform a Ranged attack of 160 Power.

walpuff.description: Walpuffs are known for their soft heads but sturdy bodies. That's why they wear protective headgear adorned with razor-sharp tusks, providing formidable armor!

skills.description: Deflect 45% of the damage dealt by one attack this turn action, regardless of the attack's priority. If triggered, earn 2 Hype.

whiskube.description: Whiskubes love to rest on ice, but their reflective bodies cause them to melt it while sleeping. This leads to a sudden plunge into cold water, giving them quite the wake-up call!

skills.name: SUCKER COUNTER III
skills.description: Reflect back to the opponent 50% of the damage dealt this turn action and perform a counter attack of 50 Power using your Defense instead of Attack. You take the remaining damage.

dinotusk.description: Dinotusks use their unique tails to ground themselves to Tokane, generating energy and enabling survival in harsh environments.

tokoma.description: Tokomas, the most loyal among Nefties, forms a lifelong bond and will protect its trainer at all costs!
